name: Httpdownloader
tagline: A simple http download tool written in Java Swing.
body: httpdownloader ============== A simple http download tool written in Java Swing(Support breakpoint transmission). ####How to build#### run gradle jar to generate executable JAR. or gradle distZip to generate a zip distribution. or gradle installApp to install into 'build/install'. #### Screenshots ![main](screenshots/main.png) ![add](screenshots/add.png)
